text: A lightly fermented pineapple drink, sweetened with piloncillo and flavored with spices. Tepache is a refreshing and traditional beverage unique to Coyuca de Benítez.
Fresh shrimp cooked in garlic, butter, and regional spices. A delicious dish that highlights the coastal flavors of Coyuca de Benítez.
Traditional tamales made with corn dough and filled with pork, chicken, or sweet ingredients, wrapped in banana leaves. Commonly served during local festivities and family gatherings.
